name: OTAUpdateGET
description: This API returns the details of an Over the Air (OTA) update.

$ul: **data**: This object represents an Over the Air (OTA) update request. It allows tracking the current status of a operation that apply settings in a particular SIM card.
**created_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was created.
**settings**: A JSON object representation of the operation. The information present here will relate directly to the source of the OTA request.
**mobile_operator_networks_preferences**: A list of mobile operator networks and the priority that should be applied when the SIM is connecting to the network.
**sim_card_id**: The identification UUID of the related SIM card resource.
**type**: Represents the type of the operation requested. This will relate directly to the source of the request.
**updated_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was updated.
